meanings.definition: An enzyme that causes blood or other liquid to coagulate.
meanings.sent1: The coagulase helped the liquid to become thicker.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used coagulase to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent3: The coagulase decided to turn the liquid into jelly for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a coagulase, bringing the group together in unity.
meanings.sent5: The coagulase worked like magic, transforming the liquid into a solid mass.
